title: Stickman Project
description: Stickman Project is a 2D physics-based action battle game where you take on your opponents by unleashing mutant chaos. Youâ€™ll battle through dynamic levels using fluid combat and fast reflexes. Choose between endless more or level-based missions and test how long you can survive in this intense, stick-figure showdown. Made by Neron's Brother, Creators of Supreme Duelist.
